name: Full Regression Test Suite
description: Master regression suite orchestrating all critical feature tests: Captain Z enforcement, FedSpace MSL asset denial, Cluster Generation v2 invariants, Police Phase A/B/C, and Ferengi NPC initialization.

features_covered: FedSpace MSL asset deployment denial (deny in 1-10, destroy in >10)
Police Phase A: RPC availability and jurisdiction stubs
Police Phase B: Incident state tracking (suspicion/wanted_level) and port robbery trigger
Police Phase C: Resolution mechanics (bribery success/failure, surrender outcomes) and ban enforcement
prerequisites: Server running and accessible at configured host:port
